name: Fueto
author: Fueto.com

sections.description:
Fueto brings socially relevant results to your readers when they search within your WP blog. Fueto replaces the default search with socially-powered results. Out of the relevant matching posts, we bring higher exposure to your most viral posts (most shared, liked, etc).

Advantages of Fueto:

  • Better results and overall experience for your users. They find your absolute best posts that are relevant to what they’re looking for, which means happy users who’ll share more of your posts, more often.
  • Fueto is free and very easy to use (no need to write PHP code). Just install the plugin and you’re done, (it’ll take us a few minutes to FuetoIndex all your posts).
  • Due to our secret sauce (FuetoIndex), we’re the only ones to provide a search engine this powerful that’s able to surface your best posts on top of search results.

Main Features of Fueto:

  • Versatile – Works with all WP themes and templates
  • Adaptive – Keeps your current look and feel
  • AutoComplete – Users are presented potential queries as they type
  • Exact matching – Readers can search for ‘queries’ to get exact matches
  • Pagination – Results will be divided into pages for easy use
  • And much more!

Give it a shot, your readers will love your blog search powered by Fueto!

P.S. Follow us on Twitter for updates and announcements. https://twitter.com/#!/fuetocom

tags: search, fueto, social, social search, wp search, wordpress search, search engine, blog search, social signals

short_description: Fueto is a free, fully-hosted, API-based, outsourced search engine for your WP blog. Fueto wins because we use social signals to rank search results.
